summary: "X-Men: The Last Stand" is a 2006 superhero movie about mutants, based on Marvel comic books. It's the third movie in the original X-Men trilogy. The story revolves around a "mutant cure" causing trouble for both mutants and humans, and the return of Jean Grey with a dark power. Many key people from the first two movies didn't work on this one. The film was directed by Brett Ratner and starred Hugh Jackman and Halle Berry. It made a lot of money but got mixed reviews. Later movies in the series changed some of its story.
title: X-Men The Last Stand
